meanings.definition: A long, thin strand of cotton, nylon, or other fibers used in sewing or weaving.
meanings.sent1: She carefully pulled the threads through the needle.
meanings.sent2: The threads in the fabric were beautifully woven together.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous kitten played with the threads, unraveling the whole sweater.
meanings.sent4: The threads of fate seemed to weave a mysterious pattern in her life.
meanings.sent5: The colorful threads danced in the wind, creating a mesmerizing display.

meanings.definition: A theme or characteristic running throughout a conversation or piece of writing.
meanings.sent1: The threads of love and loss were evident in the novel.
meanings.sent2: The threads of friendship tied the group together.
meanings.sent3: The comedian skillfully wove humor into the threads of his speech.
meanings.sent4: The threads of destiny intertwined their lives in unexpected ways.
meanings.sent5: The threads of hope shone brightly in her words, inspiring all who listened.

meanings.definition: A series of messages or comments on an online forum or social media platform.
meanings.sent1: She followed the threads of the discussion to understand the topic better.
meanings.sent2: The threads on the forum were filled with diverse opinions.
meanings.sent3: The humorous thread about cats had everyone laughing out loud.
meanings.sent4: The thread of support from online friends lifted her spirits during tough times.
meanings.sent5: The controversial thread sparked a heated debate among users.
